author: Ari Levy
title: Amazon has been the king of big tech stocks during the coronavirus sell-off
description: Amazon's stock price is down 11% since the market peaked on Feb. 19, while Apple, Microsoft, Alphabet and Facebook have each plunged more than 20%. And that tells you everything you need to know about the company's critical role.
content:
During the past month's extreme market volatility, Amazon has been a relative safe haven.
And that tells you everything you need to know about the company's critical role in society. 
Even with the economy almost certainly headed into recession and unemploy… [+2493 chars]
